response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. This product, while valued at $12,000 to us due to its unique features and benefits, comes with a special introductory offer just for you. We're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a price of $10,000. This offer is designed to recognize your potential to maximize the value of this product. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your business or lifestyle with our top-tier solution. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.", "product_price": 10000}
